title: Fantasy SFX Pack Bundle
description: AAA Quality Sound Effects for Video Games! Perfect choice for indie game developers and sound designers.
longDescription:
AAA Quality Sound Effects for Video Games! Perfect choice for game developers and sound designers.

Let us introduce our Fantasy Sound Effect Pack Bundle in what we are offering the following pack categories: Dragon, footstep, magic fire, magic water, sword


The pack was professionally created, carefully designed by our sound designer and his flawless knowledge, in order to offer the best quality sounds for you. Our high quality sounds are offering an efficient solution for your game. Perfect to bring your project into life.


Format: WAV 44.1 khz 16bit


Categories:

Dragon, footstep, magic fire, magic water, swordÂ

Format: WAV 44.1 khz 16bit

Size: 106 mb
